column4: Greetings. I have just shared a folder in my home folder using Samba. I'm now trying to connect from a windows computer, but no luck. I enter the username and password for my linux users, but nothing happens. What am I doing wrong ?

Greetings. I have just shared a folder in my home folder using Samba. I'm now trying to connect from a windows computer, but no luck. I enter the username and password for my linux users, but nothing happens. What am I doing wrong ?
dont just repeat paste! Give people a chance! People aren't going to respond quicker. Give it 5-10 mins at least!
